channel.title: Finally finished the script. [Server Status]
channel.description:
Hey, just me again. ( Inside Sin's reporter ) saying:
My new Server status. ( Not all mine ). http://www.runejava.net/forum/index.php?action=status Check it out, it's hot and new. It took about a week of 1 hour editing, but we got to the final product, we are still improving. But it looks perfect ;) [b]Updates:[/b] - Takes all ports, except 80 (Websites) - New Sleek Design. - Register your own server, never disappears! - One page, so all servers can be accessed simpley and no competition over the first page. - Automatic refresh rate, refreshing every 30 seconds or so. Thanks, Inside Sin.
;)

item.title: Finally finished the script. [Server Status]

item.description:
@i_make_servers wrote:

Hmmm, true. I was wondering if it was good or bad.

Thanks for informing me

Read full topic

item.title: Finally finished the script. [Server Status]
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Lol… Auto re-fresh.

Your going to be using a lot of bandwidth.

I may just sign-up and leave my Firefox open all day and night for about a week. Just on your website. So I will use your bandwidth.

NOTE: Let them have to refresh it.

Read full topic

item.title: Finally finished the script. [Server Status]
item.dc:creator: @i_make_servers i make servers
item.description:
@i_make_servers wrote:

Hey, just me again. ( Inside Sin’s reporter ) saying:

My new Server status. ( Not all mine ). http://www.runejava.net/forum/index.php?action=status

Check it out, it’s hot and new. It took about a week of 1 hour editing, but we got to the final product, we are still improving. But it looks perfect

Updates:

  • Takes all ports, except 80 (Websites)
  • New Sleek Design.
  • Register your own server, never disappears!
  • One page, so all servers can be accessed simpley and no competition over the first page.
  • Automatic refresh rate, refreshing every 30 seconds or so.

Thanks, Inside Sin.

Read full topic
